messages.message: Is Classifier being deprecated in 23.04 as planned (https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/releasenotes/23.01.0-relnotes/index.html#deprecations-and-removals)?
no, we have not had time to actually do the deprecation https://instabase.atlassian.net/jira/polaris/projects/PFR/ideas/view/511021?selectedIssue=PFR-963&issueViewSection=comments

Okay, so we should drop the "Legacy" from the Classifier docs page?
https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/apps/classifier/index.html
i think we should still keep that label since according to the comments on the PFR ticket, we do want to fully remove it for 23.07
If we want to fully remove it in 23.07, we should list it as a deprecation in 23.04 release notes, I think.
Yes, I believe we wanted to list it as deprecated in the release notes. Can you make that change? Or I can do it tomorrow morning
